content: from * to end of round 16 20 single_crochet into each st to end of round 16 make sure you re at the centre back single_crochet into the next 4 sts then single_crochet into any st of round 11 of an arm continue to single_crochet into the next 7sts around 21 the arm and then single_crochet into the next st on the torso single_crochet into the next 7 sts and then repeat with the other arm and then single_crochet into the last 4 sts on the torso 32 add stuffing to the body there s no need to stuff the arms 22 decrease 16 times 16 finish stuffing the body 23 decrease 8 times 8 24 single_crochet into each st to end of round 8 25 * single_crochet into next st 2sc into next st repeat from * to end of round 12 26 2sc into each st to end of round 24 3 27-31 single_crochet into each st to end of round 24 32 decrease 12 times 12 stuff the head very loosely see step below for explanation decrease 6 times close off the opening and 33 fasten_off press the front of the head inward so that it s concave this is to help position the petals later on front face/petals starting with black yarn b round #
